did.abstract: This account ledger from Lucretia, Virginia, documents individual, shipping, and railroad accounts.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from the J.T. Oglesby Account Ledger must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: J.T. Oglesby Account Ledger, Ms2009-127, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The J.T. Oglesby Account Ledger was purchased by Special Collections in June 2009.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the J.T. Oglesby Account Ledger commenced and was completed in September 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: No biographical or historical information is availabe.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This account ledger from Lucretia, Virginia, documents railroad and shipping accounts, as well as individual accounts. The amount of each debt is recorded along with the date, amount, and form of repayment. The ledger is empty starting from page 70.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Special Collections houses many ledgers and accounts from stores in the Southwest Virginia and Appalachia regions. Some, but not all of these collections have finding aids on the Virginia Heritage database. In the "Limit by Institution" box, select "Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University". Descriptions of other collections may be available from the Special Collections website or through the Virginia Tech Library catalog, Addison. The "Advanced Search" in Addison allows searches to be limited to Special Collections.
